shopItems.name: Snack
shopItems.description: Restores 1 HEART and 1 ENERGY when consumed.

shopItems.name: Meal
shopItems.description: Restores 3 HEARTS and 3 ENERGY when consumed.

shopItems.name: Bomb
shopItems.description: Can blow things up or deplete 2 monster HEARTS.

shopItems.name: Energy Potion
shopItems.description: Restores all ENERGY. Must be consumed immediately or stored in a bottle.

shopItems.name: Heart Potion
shopItems.description: Restores all HEARTS. Must be consumed immediately or stored in a bottle.

shopItems.name: Pixie
shopItems.description: Restores all HEARTS. If stored in a bottle, it activates automatically when the hero goes unconscious.

shopItems.name: Vitality Potion
shopItems.description: Restores all HEARTS and ENERGY. Must be consumed immediately or stored in a bottle.

shopItems.name: Bottle
shopItems.description: Can store a potion, bug or pixie.

shopItems.name: Energy Container
shopItems.description: Increases one hero's maximum ENERGY by 1 and restores all ENERGY.

shopItems.name: Heart Container
shopItems.description: Increases one hero's maximum HEARTS by 1 and restores all HEARTS.
